43 namespace chomp
44 {
45 static const int DIFF_RULE_LENGTH = 7;
46 
47 // the differentiation rules (centered at the center)
48 static const double DIFF_RULES[3][DIFF_RULE_LENGTH] = {
49  { 0, 0, -2 / 6.0, -3 / 6.0, 6 / 6.0, -1 / 6.0, 0 }, // velocity
50  { 0, -1 / 12.0, 16 / 12.0, -30 / 12.0, 16 / 12.0, -1 / 12.0, 0 }, // acceleration
51  { 0, 1 / 12.0, -17 / 12.0, 46 / 12.0, -46 / 12.0, 17 / 12.0, -1 / 12.0 } // jerk
52 };
53 
54 static inline void robotStateToArray(const moveit::core::RobotState& state, const std::string& planning_group_name,
55  Eigen::MatrixXd::RowXpr joint_array)
56 {
57  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* group = state.getJointModelGroup(planning_group_name);
58  size_t joint_index = 0;
59  for (const moveit::core::JointModel* jm : group->getActiveJointModels())
60  joint_array[joint_index++] = state.getVariablePosition(jm->getFirstVariableIndex());
61 }
62 
63 // copied from geometry/angles/angles.h
64 static inline double normalizeAnglePositive(double angle)
65 {
66  return fmod(fmod(angle, 2.0 * M_PI) + 2.0 * M_PI, 2.0 * M_PI);
67 }
68 
69 static inline double normalizeAngle(double angle)
70 {
71  double a = normalizeAnglePositive(angle);
72  if (a > M_PI)
73  a -= 2.0 * M_PI;
74  return a;
75 }
76 
77 static inline double shortestAngularDistance(double start, double end)
78 {
79  double res = normalizeAnglePositive(normalizeAnglePositive(end) - normalizeAnglePositive(start));
80  if (res > M_PI)
81  {
82  res = -(2.0 * M_PI - res);
83  }
84  return normalizeAngle(res);
85 }
86 
87 } // namespace chomp
